mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.`o_id`) FROM `the_order` a,`user` b,`mark` c,`scenery` d

SELECT a.`o_id`,b.`u_name`,b.`u_phone`,c.`m_name`,d.`s_title`,a.`o_person`,a.`tools_id`,a.`class_id`,a.`o_price` FROM `the_order` a,`user` b,`mark` c,`scenery` d order by ${sort} ${order} limit #{pages},#{rowss}
SELECT COUNT(a.`o_id`) AS o_id,d.`s_title`FROM `the_order` a,`scenery` d WHERE a.`s_id`=d.`s_id` AND a.`m_id`=#{m_id} GROUP BY d.`s_title`

SELECT COUNT(a.`o_id`) AS o_id,d.`s_title`FROM `the_order` a,`scenery` d WHERE a.`s_id`=d.`s_id` AND a.`m_id`=#{m_id} AND DATE_FORMAT(`o_create`,'%Y-%m')=CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),#{month}) GROUP BY d.`s_title`
SELECT SUM(`o_price`) AS o_id,d.`s_title`FROM `the_order` a,`scenery` d WHERE a.`s_id`=d.`s_id` AND a.`m_id`=#{m_id} GROUP BY d.`s_title`
